lore: This gunfighter is a living icon of rebellion, moulded to exploit the psyche of fractured Human societies. Whip-fast reactions and hypersensory acuity lend the Kelermorph lethal reaction speeds and help it unleash withering volleys from its iconic liberator autostubs, whose depleted volonium rounds can punch through tank armour.

otherAbilities.name: Heroic Fusillade
otherAbilities.description: Once per turn, after one model from your army with this ability has shot, you can select one INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

otherAbilities.name: Hypersensory Abilities
otherAbilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponentâ€™s Movement phase, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 12'' of this model, if this model is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can shoot at that unit as if it were your Shooting phase and then make a Normal move of up to D6''' (it cannot embark within a TRANSPORT as part of this move).
